name: Eternal Cave Escape
storyline: You find yourself in a cave, at Rock Bottom. You know nothing other than your ability to move, jump and use a pickaxe to climb. As you rise you'll find this is no ordinary cave. Can you truly escape this seemingly endless cave?
summary: Eternal Cave Escape is a precision-platformer that challenges players to climb their way out of a cave using a pickaxe. Mistakes in this cave cost the player time rather than lives, as all progress can be lost through falling. Will you rise out of this seemingly endless cave, or will you be stuck here forever?
